item.title: Dance Move Recognition Using the Fourier Transform
item.description: A partner and I created a game where a user completes certain dance moves after we show them what to complete, and we score them on how well they dance and check if they are dancing the correct move. This algorithm uses: accelerometer data FFT cross correlation signal aligning techniques To read more about the algorithm and how the game works, click the link to the left. (Full Paper)
